it.cnr.isti.thematrix.scripting.sys

Class SchemaTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,DatasetSchema>
        • it.cnr.isti.thematrix.scripting.sys.SchemaTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,DatasetSchema>

    public class SchemaTable
extends java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,DatasetSchema>
    A simple Map from schema names to DatasetSchema. It is designed to hold each schema that should be globally available or it may be necessary throughout a script. It is used in TheMatrixSys and TheMatrixIADDefinition to maintain a list of the predefined schemata. It may be used by the interpreter to add new schema definitions (using `declareSchema`. This feature has never really been used as of 01/01/14)
    Author:
    edoardovacchi
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
